extras.new_content:
# DPO loss implementation (ignoring ipo, reference_free, label_smoothing)
    # r_chosen = beta * (policy_chosen_logps - reference_chosen_logps)
    # r_rejected = beta * (policy_rejected_logps - reference_rejected_logps)
    chosen_rewards = beta * (policy_chosen_logps - reference_chosen_logps)
    rejected_rewards = beta * (policy_rejected_logps - reference_rejected_logps)
    # Bradley-Terry: loss = -log(sigmoid(r_chosen - r_rejected))
    losses = -torch.nn.functional.logsigmoid(chosen_rewards - rejected_rewards)
    return losses, chosen_rewards, rejected_rewards

+    # r_rejected = beta * (policy_rejected_logps - reference_rejected_logps)
+    chosen_rewards = beta * (policy_chosen_logps - reference_chosen_logps)
+    rejected_rewards = beta * (policy_rejected_logps - reference_rejected_logps)
+    # Bradley-Terry: loss = -log(sigmoid(r_chosen - r_rejected))
